definitions: Throwing or hurling something with a forceful, sweeping motion.
Hanging or carrying something loosely, especially over the shoulder.
Moving quickly or forcefully in a particular direction.
Selling or dispensing something, often illicitly or in large quantities.
examples: He was slinging insults at his opponent.
She was slinging her backpack over her shoulder.
The car was slinging mud as it sped down the road.
They were slinging drinks all night at the bar.
